PersonalStatement.text: Drew Andrews, born on 1978-06-28, is a Male based in North Anna, French Polynesia. He is Single and holds Polish nationality. Currently working at Wade LLC.

WorkExperience.text: Project Manager at Wood, Morrison and Flynn from 2015 to 2019.
Senior Research Scientist at Wade LLC, 2018 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: PhD in Computer Science from Tallinn University of Technology (TalTech)
Master's in Engineering from Shanghai University

PersonalSkills.text: Problem-solving: Skilled in troubleshooting and optimizing complex systems.
Adaptability: Able to quickly learn and implement new technologies.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys photography.
